fields.headline: Talk of the town
fields.bodyText: Italian in Sorrento The perfect way to avoid Christmas and return knowing your alloras from your avantis, this course at the Sorrento Lingue Instituto includes 20 group lessons, a day's excursion to Naples, sightseeing in Sorrento and - here's the master stroke - cookery lessons with your host family on December 23, 24 and 25. The Italian for turkey is tacchino. · Cactus Languages (0845 130 4775, cactuslanguage.com) has courses around the world and many more in Italy; this one (December 16-27) costs £989pp including tuition and half-board homestay. Portuguese in Brazil JLA offer courses in Rio as well, but Salvador - Rio's edgier northern brother - is a great glimpse into Brazil's African culture and has a fine 18th-century central district called Pelhourinho. The language school is five minutes from the beach and the Atlantic and offers afternoon activities such as cookery, dancing and the athletic martial art capoeira. · JLA (+ 44 (0)20-8747 8315/+ 44 (0)161-832 1441, journeylatinamerica.co.uk) has one- to four-week Portuguese courses in Salvador from £310pp, including tuition, activities and homestay. International flights from £700 including taxes. German and skiing in Kitzbühel, Austria The director of the language school is a keen skier and reckons that if you get the ski bus straight after morning lessons you can fit in four hours a day on the slopes - and all day at weekends. Meanwhile, mornings are spent on the Intensive German course (20 hours per week), followed by rigorous evening practice ordering drinks in the busy après-ski scene of Kitzbühel. · Languages Abroad (+44 (0)1509 211612, languagesabroad.co.uk) has a one-week German course in Kitzbühel from £350pp. Courses with 2-star or 3-star hotel accommodation from £508pp. Ski hire, ski passes extra. French in Charente The good thing about Château L'Age Baston is that one partner can learn French while the other does cookery, walking, painting or nothing. Choose from the more casual Francophile course, intensive, or one-to-one tuition, all taught by native French speakers. · L'Age Baston (+33 5 45 63 53 07, lagebaston.com) has seven-night French for Francophile and Intensive French breaks from March 20, for £755pp and £998pp respectively, including 30 hours' tuition and full board. Spanish and cookery in Mexico A concentration challenge, learning Spanish almost next to the beach on the Yucatan peninsula, but this school - in an old colonial building in Playa del Carmen, a merciful 60km south of Cancun - keeps your nose to the grindstone in the morning before releasing you to cook and play in the afternoon. · Caledonia Languages (+44 (0)131-621 7721, caledonialanguages.com) has one-week Spanish and cookery courses for £215, two-week courses cost £395.
